data.title: Strategic Hotel Consulting – About Us
data.meta_description: Strategic Hotel Consulting is an international consulting firm specialising in hotel investments. We deliver independent, objective analysis and expert advice.
data.text:
Tea Ros is one of the leading hotel consultants globally and the Founder and Managing Director of Strategic Hotel Consulting. She has 19 years of experience in hotel consulting, having carried out a variety of assignments while working with SHC and in her previous roles with Jones Lang LaSalle Hotels in Asia Pacific and with TRI Hospitality Consulting in the Middle East.

As a recognized industry professional, Tea is President, Board Member and Member of the International Society of Hospitality Consultants (ISHC). She serves on advisory boards of numerous companies including ENVI Lodges. Tea is a sought-after speaker at industry events and features as #13 on the Power List - the most influential Women in Hospitality by Hotelier Middle East.

Tea has a comprehensive operational background, having worked with the Four Seasons (North America), Starwood (Middle East) and Rosewood (Europe) in positions covering F&B, rooms division, revenue and yield management, sales and marketing and Six Sigma process improvement.

Tea has advised key developers, investors and operators including:

Julen Group

Manz Privacy Hotels

Abu Dhabi National Hotels

Fáilte Ireland

Jebel Ali Free Zone Authority

Sorouh Real Estate

Shui On Land Limited

New Zealand Trade and Enterprise

Swiss Property Management
